backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, registrations, OTP handling, access control, blob storage, and admin credential management with rate-limited login attempts.
backend/migration.mo: Migration script that resets admin credentials to default values when upgrading, unless they already match the defaults.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping admin‑panel related features to source files, components, and test IDs with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files related to registration flow, admin panel, styling, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode theme values, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry page setting title, font preloads, and mounting point for the frontend application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling splash screen timing and switching between the RegistrationFlow and AdminPanel views.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Animated splash screen with reduced‑motion support, auto‑dismiss timer, and a manual skip button.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Admin dashboard managing Internet Identity login, admin setup, password login, registration list retrieval, and editing/deletion flows.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: UI card for handling admin access recovery via setup code or password login with identity status display and form interactions.
Error boundary that catches rendering failures in admin detail views and provides a retry option.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/D: Displays document images from blob URLs with loading, error handling, and retry, plus a placeholder when unavailable.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/E: Form for editing registration details with controlled fields, validation, and save/cancel handling.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/R: Displays registration details with states for loading, errors, no selection, and supports editing and deletion.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAdm: React Query mutation for admin password login with backend error normalization and query invalidation.
Provides React Query hooks for admin checks, role fetching, claims, and resilient registration retrieval using an actor API.
Handles applying an admin setup code, normalizing errors, storing the token, and invalidating related React Query caches.
frontend/src/features/registration/compo: Error boundary that catches step rendering errors and displays a recovery UI with technical details and a refresh option.
frontend/src/features/registration/hooks: Provides a hook to detect double‑click or double‑tap interactions and show a temporary hint on single interactions.
Defines mutations for generating OTPs, verifying them, and submitting registrations with document blobs via the actor API.
frontend/src/features/registration/Regis: Implements the multi‑step registration flow with validation, navigation, and a hidden double‑interaction shortcut to the admin panel.
frontend/src/features/registration/steps: Collects and validates customer details, updating parent validation state only when form validity or data changes.
Handles phone-based OTP generation, verification, and final registration submission, showing success UI on completion.
Displays T&C, tracks acceptance with timestamp, and supports sanitized printing with customer details and terms.
Manages Aadhaar, PAN, and optional payment receipt uploads with previews and validation callbacks.
frontend/src/features/registration/terms: Exports structured terms and conditions sections for router and service policies.
frontend/src/features/registration/types: Defines customer details, document upload data, and shared props interfaces for registration steps.
frontend/src/features/registration/valid: Validates customer details including phone, age, email, and address, returning field-specific error messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor bound to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, identity persistence, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, light/dark theme CSS variables, admin panel dark theme overrides, and splash screen styling and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, custom colors tied to CSS variables, fonts, and extended utilities/plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
